price: Mteremsho wa Kitabu hiki umetokana na Mwenyezi Mungu, Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye hikima.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
footnotes: Qur'ani imeteremka kutokana na Mwenyezi Mungu, ambaye hana wa kumshinda kwa atakayo; Mwenye hikima katika vitendo vyake na utungaji wa sharia zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
